msbt.message: Hey, , do you know about Reactions?When you're, you know, happy but don't want to be generic happyjust move like this!What do you think? Pretty fab, right? Just press  when you want to show the world how happy you are!

Being able to rock a fab smile? MAJOR life skill, .Check this out BOOM! SMILES!Come on, ! SMILE with me!Happiness Reactions are awesome! Let's go smile at people all day!<10_4 /> Some folks find that unsettling

GRRR! I got a stain on my fave outfit!, what do you do when things are just THE WORST? WellTHIS is what I do!Some folks call it pouting, but I say it's me telling the world to QUIT BEING MEAN!Anyhoo, using Aggravation can def make you feel better. <10_4 />See? I'm all good now, !

There are Reactions for everything! When you're sleepy, you can usewait for itSleepy!Yaaaawn<10_4 /> It's totally great!Somebody sees you do that and they'll know you've been up all night, probs dancing on your bed!

Guesssss. WHAT. I have something I TOTES, TOTAL, TOTALLY need to tell you!Lean in close<10_4 /> Wait. Ummm What was it? Can you guess?Do you like the Reaction for Curiosity? Because I'm doing it right now. Pretty neat, huh?So, like, if I want to learn about a new thing, I just ask about it and wait to hear the deets!Curiosity allows you to learn about the world around you. And doesn't that sound très fab?

Wouldn't it be pretty funny if you saw someone take a bite of a toothpaste-frosted cupcake?Pretty funny gag, right? Wh-what?! No! I wouldn't ACTUALLY do that.I'm just showing you that Mischief Reactions can be a lot of fun!
